name: juxtapose

simple-git-hooks.pre-push: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run lint

comments: I added wrangler here is because of deps, alchemy has mismatching version required with @cloudflare/vite-plugin. This forces wrangler to be a specific version

The pnpm.overrides.drizzle-orm setting forces a single shared instance of drizzle-orm across the monorepo. Without this, pnpm creates multiple instances (due to different peer dependency trees - @opentelemetry/api from 'ai' package, @cloudflare/workers-types version mismatches, etc). This causes TypeScript errors where SQLiteColumn/SQLiteTable types from one instance are incompatible with the same types from another instance because classes with private/protected members are nominally typed
